```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(flexdashboard)
df<-data.frame(rollno=c(1:5),name=c('a','b','c','d','e'),marks=c(78,45,23,44,35))
View(df)
library(sqldf)
s1<-sqldf('select * from df order by marks')
View(s1)
```
